mapper.insert: insert into member values (#{memberId}, #{memberName, typeHandler=handler.EncryptionTypeHandler}, #{memberCompanyName}, #{memberPassword}, #{memberTel, typeHandler=handler.EncryptionTypeHandler}, #{memberCompanyTel}, #{memberAddress, typeHandler=handler.EncryptionTypeHandler}, #{memberDetailAddress, typeHandler=handler.EncryptionTypeHandler}, #{memberDeliveryAddress, typeHandler=handler.EncryptionTypeHandler}, #{memberDetailDeliveryAddress, typeHandler=handler.EncryptionTypeHandler}, #{memberEmail, typeHandler=handler.EncryptionTypeHandler}, #{memberFile}, 0000, 0, NOW(), 0, null, null, null)
mapper.select: set @rownum := 0
select count(*) from member where NOT member_id = "admin"

select * from ( select @rownum := @rownum + 1 as rownum, a.* from member a, (select @rownum := 0) tmp where NOT member_id = "admin" order by member_tier ) b where b.rownum between #{start} and #{end};
select * from ( select @rownum := @rownum + 1 as rownum, a.* from member a, (select @rownum := 0) tmp where NOT member_id = "admin") b;
select * from member where member_id = #{memberId}
select member_id from member where member_name = #{memberName} and member_email = #{memberEmail}
select member_password from member where member_id = #{memberId} and member_email = #{memberEmail}

select * from ( select @rownum := @rownum + 1 as rownum, a.* from member a, (select @rownum := 0) tmp where NOT member_id = "admin" order by member_company_name ) b where b.rownum between #{start} and #{end};

select * from ( select @rownum := @rownum + 1 as rownum, a.* from member a, (select @rownum := 0) tmp where NOT member_id = "admin" order by member_company_name desc ) b where b.rownum between #{start} and #{end};

select * from ( select @rownum := @rownum + 1 as rownum, a.* from member a, (select @rownum := 0) tmp where NOT member_id = "admin" order by member_fran_code ) b where b.rownum between #{start} and #{end};

select * from ( select @rownum := @rownum + 1 as rownum, a.* from member a, (select @rownum := 0) tmp where NOT member_id = "admin" order by member_fran_code desc ) b where b.rownum between #{start} and #{end};
select * from ( select @rownum := @rownum + 1 as rownum, a.* from member a, (select @rownum := 0) tmp where NOT member_id = "admin" order by member_id ) b where b.rownum between #{start} and #{end};

select * from ( select @rownum := @rownum + 1 as rownum, a.* from member a, (select @rownum := 0) tmp where NOT member_id = "admin" order by member_id desc ) b where b.rownum between #{start} and #{end};

select * from ( select @rownum := @rownum + 1 as rownum, a.* from member a, (select @rownum := 0) tmp where NOT member_id = "admin" order by member_name ) b where b.rownum between #{start} and #{end};

select * from ( select @rownum := @rownum + 1 as rownum, a.* from member a, (select @rownum := 0) tmp where NOT member_id = "admin" order by member_name desc ) b where b.rownum between #{start} and #{end};
select * from ( select @rownum := @rownum + 1 as rownum, a.* from member a, (select @rownum := 0) tmp where NOT member_id = "admin" order by member_tel ) b where b.rownum between #{start} and #{end};

select * from ( select @rownum := @rownum + 1 as rownum, a.* from member a, (select @rownum := 0) tmp where NOT member_id = "admin" order by member_tel desc ) b where b.rownum between #{start} and #{end};

select * from ( select @rownum := @rownum + 1 as rownum, a.* from member a, (select @rownum := 0) tmp where NOT member_id = "admin" order by member_company_tel ) b where b.rownum between #{start} and #{end};

select * from ( select @rownum := @rownum + 1 as rownum, a.* from member a, (select @rownum := 0) tmp where NOT member_id = "admin" order by member_company_tel desc ) b where b.rownum between #{start} and #{end};

select * from ( select @rownum := @rownum + 1 as rownum, a.* from member a, (select @rownum := 0) tmp where NOT member_id = "admin" order by member_tier ) b where b.rownum between #{start} and #{end};

select * from ( select @rownum := @rownum + 1 as rownum, a.* from member a, (select @rownum := 0) tmp where NOT member_id = "admin" order by member_tier desc ) b where b.rownum between #{start} and #{end};

select * from ( select @rownum := @rownum + 1 as rownum, a.* from member a, (select @rownum := 0) tmp where NOT member_id = "admin" order by member_date ) b where b.rownum between #{start} and #{end};

select * from ( select @rownum := @rownum + 1 as rownum, a.* from member a, (select @rownum := 0) tmp where NOT member_id = "admin" order by member_date desc ) b where b.rownum between #{start} and #{end};

select * from ( select @rownum := @rownum + 1 as rownum, a.* from member a, (select @rownum := 0) tmp where NOT member_id = "admin" order by member_disable ) b where b.rownum between #{start} and #{end};

select * from ( select @rownum := @rownum + 1 as rownum, a.* from member a, (select @rownum := 0) tmp where NOT member_id = "admin" order by member_disable desc ) b where b.rownum between #{start} and #{end};

select * from ( select @rownum := @rownum + 1 as rownum, a.* from member a, (select @rownum := 0) tmp where NOT member_id = "admin" and member_company_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%')) b where b.rownum between #{start} and #{end};

select * from ( select @rownum := @rownum + 1 as rownum, a.* from member a, (select @rownum := 0) tmp where NOT member_id = "admin" and member_fran_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%')) b where b.rownum between #{start} and #{end};

select * from ( select @rownum := @rownum + 1 as rownum, a.* from member a, (select @rownum := 0) tmp where NOT member_id = "admin" and member_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%')) b where b.rownum between #{start} and #{end};

select * from ( select @rownum := @rownum + 1 as rownum, a.* from member a, (select @rownum := 0) tmp where NOT member_id = "admin" and member_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%')) b where b.rownum between #{start} and #{end};

select * from ( select @rownum := @rownum + 1 as rownum, a.* from member a, (select @rownum := 0) tmp where NOT member_id = "admin" and member_tel LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%')) b where b.rownum between #{start} and #{end};

select * from ( select @rownum := @rownum + 1 as rownum, a.* from member a, (select @rownum := 0) tmp where NOT member_id = "admin" and member_company_tel LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%')) b where b.rownum between #{start} and #{end};

select * from ( select @rownum := @rownum + 1 as rownum, a.* from member a, (select @rownum := 0) tmp where NOT member_id = "admin" and member_tier LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%')) b where b.rownum between #{start} and #{end};

select * from ( select @rownum := @rownum + 1 as rownum, a.* from member a, (select @rownum := 0) tmp where NOT member_id = "admin" and member_disable LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%')) b where b.rownum between #{start} and #{end};
mapper.update: update member set member_password = #{memberTempPassword} where member_id = #{memberId}
update member set member_tier = #{memberTier} where member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.insert: insert into member_withdrawal (member_id, member_company_name, member_tel, member_company_tel) select member_id, member_company_name, member_tel, member_company_tel from member where member_id = #{member_id}
mapper.select: select * from ( select @rownum := @rownum + 1 as rownum, a.* from member_withdrawal a, (select @rownum := 0) tmp where NOT member_id = "admin" ) b where b.rownum between #{start} and #{end};
select count(*) from member_withdrawal where NOT member_id = "admin"
mapper.update: update member set member_disable = #{memberDisable}, member_disable_date = NOW() where member_id = #{memberId}
